site.title: Gaëtan Bloch, Polyglot Software Engineer
site.description: Gaëtan Bloch is currently a Software Architect and Staff Engineer currently working at Key Consulting in Nantes, France. He is a polyglot software engineer, with a strong focus on the JVM ecosystem. He is also a passionate open source developer, international speaker and mentor.
